message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $175.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget.  While $125 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140 to make this work.  This is a great deal for a product of this quality. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
